all-blogposts-gone.description: My blog posts from last 3 years are all gone. The hosting provider told that they didn't kept any backup (lesson learned: backup). Meanwhile, I tried to manually add posts that saved on my local computer.

change-your-life-change-your-environment.title: How to change your life: Start changing your environment
change-your-life-change-your-environment.description: Changing your life is not that hard. Knowing this one trick could help wonders.

employed-vs-self-employed-my-decision-af.title: Employed Vs Self Employed: My Decision After Graduation
employed-vs-self-employed-my-decision-af.description: 2015 is one of my productive and life changing year ever. I learned a ton, achieved a ton, and sadlyâ€”lost tons of time here. This is also the same year I graduated from college and entered adult life. At last, I can focus on what matters now.

definition-of-design-and-the-difference-.title: Definition of Designâ€”and The Difference With Art
definition-of-design-and-the-difference-.description: Society interpret design as sketches, painting, packaging. Some of them take it as a productâ€”camera, phone, sofa, and chairs. It's true, but design is not that limited. In fact, design is broad.

how-a-small-favor-to-others-change-my-wh.title: How a Small Favor to Others, Changed My Whole Life
how-a-small-favor-to-others-change-my-wh.description: About three weeks ago, one of my college friend asked me to accompany him to local computer store and get a new laptop. I got nothing else to do so I agreed and went with him to International Trade Center in BSD City.
